You stroll around to the back of the desk and snatch the phone out of her hand and hang it up.
"Hey, I was talking..." She starts to bitch. But she stops talking when you rip her blouse off and the her bra, causing a pair of very bouncy DDs to pop out. You shove the bimbo's blonde head between her bountiful boobs and then stick them In you mouth and slurp her down. You pull off her miniskirt and panties and give her bottom a good spanking and are about to take down her lower half when a voice appears behind you.
"Ahhh, you must be the new Eater,"
You turn around with her kicking legs still sticking out of your mouth and see a rather statuesque redhead smiling at you. She waves and says, "Go ahead, finish her, I already called HR for a replacement. We lose a lot of busty blonde bimbos that way."
So, you tilt back and take her in and shake the redhead's hand. "Mandy?" She nods. "Hello, I am Joe. Pleased to meet you."
"I hope that isn't eat you, seeing your skills at work."
"Not that you aren't gulpworthy, but I can show some restraint, and I only eat those who deserve it." You hold out your folder.
She waves it off. "No, I...we know who you are, and feel privileged that you chose our family. Here is your intro packet. Inside is your room card and you have your ID, that will get you access to the lab and the front door of the living quarters, So, do you want to go straight to your room or see the lab?"
1221.title: Go directly to see Mindy

125.content:
I goofed and hit the Add Chapter button too soon. Here are the other two options.

1.) "FREEZE freak! This is an FBI Raid!"


2.) "Vore Lab? I thought this was the pizza place!"
125.title: Correcting the goof

info.brief_description: Making the world of vore better, one woman swallowed at a time.
info.description:
Welcome to Vore Lab, making the world of vore better, one woman swallowed at a time. Vore Lab is a research facility that is working on ways for people to be swallowed alive by animals, plant, and other humans, and come out alive. Thou accident do happen from time to time. You will be someone working at the labs, a research assistant. So feel free to come up with interesting ideas. But I do have some ground rules.
1. No Blood. I don’t like bloody vore. The only blood allowed is from small teeth cut’s. You can have people digested thou.
2. Sex is allowed, with humans, animals, plant, or even stranger thing.
3. Be creative, the mouth is not the only way to swallow some one.
